00011 void CHM_store_common() {
00012     SEXP rho = chm_common_env;
00013     defineVar(install("dbound"), ScalarReal(c.dbound), rho);
00014     defineVar(install("grow0"), ScalarReal(c.grow0), rho);
00015     defineVar(install("grow1"), ScalarReal(c.grow1), rho);
00016     defineVar(install("grow2"), ScalarInteger(c.grow2), rho);
00017     defineVar(install("maxrank"), ScalarInteger(c.maxrank), rho);
00018     defineVar(install("supernodal_switch"),
00019               ScalarReal(c.supernodal_switch), rho);
00020     defineVar(install("supernodal"),
00021               ScalarInteger(c.supernodal), rho);
00022     defineVar(install("final_asis"),
00023               ScalarLogical(c.final_asis), rho);

00025               ScalarLogical(c.final_super), rho);

00027               ScalarLogical(c.final_ll), rho);

00033               ScalarLogical(c.final_resymbol), rho);

00046 void CHM_restore_common() {
00047     SEXP rho = chm_common_env;
00048     c.dbound = asReal(findVarInFrame(rho, install("dbound")));
00049     c.grow0 = asReal(findVarInFrame(rho, install("grow0")));
00050     c.grow1 = asReal(findVarInFrame(rho, install("grow1")));
00051     c.grow2 = asInteger(findVarInFrame(rho, install("grow2")));
00052     c.maxrank =
00053         asInteger(findVarInFrame(rho, install("maxrank")));
00054     c.supernodal_switch =
00055         asReal(findVarInFrame(rho, install("supernodal_switch")));
00056     c.supernodal =
00057         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("supernodal")));
00058     c.final_asis =
00059         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("final_asis")));
00060     c.final_super =
00061         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("final_super")));
00062     c.final_ll =
00063         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("final_ll")));
00064     c.final_pack =
00065         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("final_pack")));
00066     c.final_monotonic =
00067         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("final_monotonic")));
00068     c.final_resymbol =
00069         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("final_resymbol")));
00070     c.prefer_zomplex =
00071         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("prefer_zomplex")));
00072     c.prefer_upper =
00073         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("prefer_upper")));
00074     c.quick_return_if_not_posdef =
00075         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho,
00076                                  install("quick_return_if_not_posdef")));
00077     c.nmethods =
00078         asInteger(findVarInFrame(rho, install("nmethods")));
00079     c.method[0].ordering =
00080         asInteger(findVarInFrame(rho, install("m0.ord")));
00081     c.postorder =
00082         asLogical(findVarInFrame(rho, install("postorder")));

00085 SEXP CHM_set_common_env(SEXP rho) {
00086     if (!isEnvironment(rho))
00087         error(_("Argument rho must be an environment"));
00088     chm_common_env = rho;
00089     CHM_store_common();
00090     return R_NilValue;
00091 }
00092 
00093 static int stype(int ctype, SEXP x)
00094 {
00095     if ((ctype % 3) == 1) return (*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? 1 : -1;
00096     return 0;
00097 }
00098 
00099 static int xtype(int ctype)
00100 {
00101     switch(ctype / 3) {
00102     case 0: /* "d" */
00103     case 1: /* "l" */
00104         return CHOLMOD_REAL;
00105     case 2: /* "n" */
00106         return CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00107     case 3: /* "z" */
00108         return CHOLMOD_COMPLEX;
00109     }
00110     return -1;
00111 }
00112 
00113 /* coerce a vector to REAL and copy the result to freshly R_alloc'd memory */
00114 static void *RallocedREAL(SEXP x)
00115 {
00116     SEXP rx = PROTECT(coerceVector(x, REALSXP));
00117     int lx = LENGTH(rx);
00118     /* We over-allocate the memory chunk so that it is never NULL. */
00119     /* The CHOLMOD code checks for a NULL pointer even in the length-0 case. */
00120     double *ans = Memcpy((double*)R_alloc(lx + 1, sizeof(double)),
00121                          REAL(rx), lx);
00122     UNPROTECT(1);
00123     return (void*)ans;
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 static void *xpt(int ctype, SEXP x)
00128 {
00129     switch(ctype / 3) {
00130     case 0: /* "d" */
00131         return (void *) REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00132     case 1: /* "l" */
00133         return RallocedREAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00134     case 2: /* "n" */
00135         return (void *) NULL;
00136     case 3: /* "z" */
00137         return (void *) COMPLEX(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00138     }
00139     return (void *) NULL;       /* -Wall */
00140 }
00141 
00142 Rboolean check_sorted_chm(CHM_SP A)
00143 {
00144     int *Ai = (int*)(A->i), *Ap = (int*)(A->p);
00145     int j, p;
00146 
00147     for (j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) {
00148         int p1 = Ap[j], p2 = Ap[j + 1] - 1;
00149         for (p = p1; p < p2; p++)
00150             if (Ai[p] >= Ai[p + 1])
00151                 return FALSE;
00152     }
00153     return TRUE;
00154 }
00155 
00159 static void chm2Ralloc(CHM_SP dest, CHM_SP src)
00160 {
00161     int np1, nnz;
00162 
00163     /* copy all the characteristics of src to dest */
00164     memcpy(dest, src, sizeof(cholmod_sparse));
00165 
00166     /* R_alloc the vector storage for dest and copy the contents from src */
00167     np1 = src->ncol + 1;
00168     nnz = (int) cholmod_l_nnz(src, &c);
00169     dest->p = (void*) Memcpy((int*)R_alloc(sizeof(int), np1),
00170                              (int*)(src->p), np1);
00171     dest->i = (void*) Memcpy((int*)R_alloc(sizeof(int), nnz),
00172                              (int*)(src->i), nnz);
00173     if(src->xtype)
00174         dest->x = (void*) Memcpy((double*)R_alloc(sizeof(double), nnz),
00175                                  (double*)(src->x), nnz);
00176 }
00177 
00181 static void chTr2Ralloc(CHM_TR dest, CHM_TR src)
00182 {
00183     int nnz;
00184 
00185     /* copy all the (non-pointer) characteristics of src to dest */
00186     memcpy(dest, src, sizeof(cholmod_triplet));
00187 
00188     /* R_alloc the vector storage for dest and copy the contents from src */
00189     nnz = src->nnz;
00190     dest->i = (void*) Memcpy((int*)R_alloc(sizeof(int), nnz),
00191                              (int*)(src->i), nnz);
00192     dest->j = (void*) Memcpy((int*)R_alloc(sizeof(int), nnz),
00193                              (int*)(src->j), nnz);
00194     if(src->xtype)
00195         dest->x = (void*) Memcpy((double*)R_alloc(sizeof(double), nnz),
00196                                  (double*)(src->x), nnz);
00197 }
00198 
00218 CHM_SP as_cholmod_sparse(CHM_SP ans, SEXP x,
00219                          Rboolean check_Udiag, Rboolean sort_in_place)
00220 {
00221     char *valid[] = {"dgCMatrix", "dsCMatrix", "dtCMatrix",
00222                      "lgCMatrix", "lsCMatrix", "ltCMatrix",
00223                      "ngCMatrix", "nsCMatrix", "ntCMatrix",
00224                      "zgCMatrix", "zsCMatrix", "ztCMatrix",
00225                      ""};
00226     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00227         ctype = Matrix_check_class_etc(x, valid);
00228     SEXP islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00229 
00230     if (ctype < 0) error(_("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_sparse"));
00231     if (!isValid_Csparse(x))
00232         error(_("invalid object passed to as_cholmod_sparse"));
00233     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_sparse)); /* zero the struct */
00234 
00235     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_LONG;  /* characteristics of the system */
00236     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00237     ans->packed = TRUE;
00238                                 /* slots always present */
00239     ans->i = INTEGER(islot);
00240     ans->p = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym));
00241                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */
00242     ans->nrow = dims[0];
00243     ans->ncol = dims[1];
00244     /* Allow for over-allocation of the i and x slots.  Needed for
00245      * sparse X form in lme4.  Right now it looks too difficult to
00246      * check for the length of the x slot, because of the xpt
00247      * utility, but the lengths of x and i should agree. */
00248     ans->nzmax = LENGTH(islot);
00249                                 /* values depending on ctype */
00250     ans->x = xpt(ctype, x);
00251     ans->stype = stype(ctype, x);
00252     ans->xtype = xtype(ctype);
00253 
00254     /* are the columns sorted (increasing row numbers) ?*/
00255     ans->sorted = check_sorted_chm(ans);
00256     if (!(ans->sorted)) { /* sort columns */
00257         if(sort_in_place) {
00258             if (!cholmod_l_sort(ans, &c))
00259                 error(_("in_place cholmod_l_sort returned an error code"));
00260             ans->sorted = 1;
00261         }
00262         else {
00263             CHM_SP tmp = cholmod_l_copy_sparse(ans, &c);
00264             if (!cholmod_l_sort(tmp, &c))
00265                 error(_("cholmod_l_sort returned an error code"));
00266 
00267 #ifdef DEBUG_Matrix
00268             /* This "triggers" exactly for return values of dtCMatrix_sparse_solve():*/
00269             /* Don't want to translate this: want it report */
00270             Rprintf("Note: as_cholmod_sparse() needed cholmod_l_sort()ing\n");
00271 #endif
00272             chm2Ralloc(ans, tmp);
00273             cholmod_l_free_sparse(&tmp, &c);
00274         }
00275     }
00276 
00277     if (check_Udiag && ctype % 3 == 2 && (*diag_P(x) == 'U')) { /* diagU2N(.)  "in place" : */
00278         double one[] = {1, 0};
00279         CHM_SP eye = cholmod_l_speye(ans->nrow, ans->ncol, ans->xtype, &c);
00280         CHM_SP tmp = cholmod_l_add(ans, eye, one, one, TRUE, TRUE, &c);
00281 
00282 #ifdef DEBUG_Matrix_verbose /* quite often, e.g. in ../tests/indexing.R */
00283         Rprintf("Note: as_cholmod_sparse(<ctype=%d>) - diagU2N\n", ctype);
00284 #endif
00285         chm2Ralloc(ans, tmp);
00286         cholmod_l_free_sparse(&tmp, &c);
00287         cholmod_l_free_sparse(&eye, &c);
00288     } /* else :
00289        * NOTE: if(*diag_P(x) == 'U'), the diagonal is lost (!);
00290        * ---- that may be ok, e.g. if we are just converting from/to Tsparse,
00291        *      but is *not* at all ok, e.g. when used before matrix products */
00292 
00293     return ans;
00294 }
00295 
00311 SEXP chm_sparse_to_SEXP(CHM_SP a, int dofree, int uploT, int Rkind,
00312                         const char* diag, SEXP dn)
00313 {
00314     SEXP ans;
00315     char *cls = "";/* -Wall */
00316     int *dims, nnz, *aii = (int*)(a->i), *api = (int*)(a->p);
00317 
00318     PROTECT(dn);  /* dn is usually UNPROTECTed before the call */
00319 
00320                                 /* ensure a is sorted and packed */
00321     if (!a->sorted || !a->packed) cholmod_l_sort(a, &c);
00322                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00323     switch(a->xtype){
00324     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00325         cls = uploT ? "ntCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "nsCMatrix" : "ngCMatrix");
00326         break;
00327     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00328         switch(Rkind) {
00329         case 0:
00330             cls = uploT ? "dtCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "dsCMatrix" : "dgCMatrix");
00331             break;
00332         case 1:
00333             cls = uploT ? "ltCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "lsCMatrix" : "lgCMatrix");
00334             break;
00335         default:
00336             error(_("chm_sparse_to_SEXP(<real>, *): invalid 'Rkind' (real kind code)"));
00337         }
00338         break;
00339     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00340         cls = uploT ? "ztCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "zsCMatrix" : "zgCMatrix");
00341         break;
00342     default: error(_("unknown xtype in cholmod_sparse object"));
00343     }
00344     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cls)));
00345                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00346     nnz = cholmod_l_nnz(a, &c);
00347     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00348     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00349     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, a->ncol + 1)), api, a->ncol + 1);
00350     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, nnz)), aii, nnz);
00351                                 /* copy data slot if present */
00352     if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00353         int i, *m_x;
00354         double *a_x = (double *) a->x;
00355         switch(Rkind) {
00356         case 0:
00357             Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, nnz)),
00358                    a_x, nnz);
00359             break;
00360         case 1:
00361             m_x = LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, nnz));
00362             for (i=0; i < nnz; i++)
00363                 m_x[i] = ISNAN(a_x[i]) ? NA_LOGICAL : (int) a_x[i]; /* or f != 0 */
00364             break;
00365         }
00366     }
00367     else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00368         error(_("complex sparse matrix code not yet written"));
00369 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, nnz)), */
00370 /*             (complex *) a->x, nnz); */
00371     if (uploT) {                /* slots for triangularMatrix */
00372         if (a->stype) error(_("Symmetric and triangular both set"));
00373         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym, mkString((uploT > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00374         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_diagSym, mkString(diag));
00375     }
00376     if (a->stype)               /* slot for symmetricMatrix */
00377         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,
00378                  mkString((a->stype > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00379     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_l_free_sparse(&a, &c);
00380     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00381     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00382         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00383 
00384     UNPROTECT(2);
00385     return ans;
00386 }
00387 
00404 CHM_TR as_cholmod_triplet(CHM_TR ans, SEXP x, Rboolean check_Udiag)
00405 {
00406     char *valid[] = {"dgTMatrix", "dsTMatrix", "dtTMatrix",
00407                      "lgTMatrix", "lsTMatrix", "ltTMatrix",
00408                      "ngTMatrix", "nsTMatrix", "ntTMatrix",
00409                      "zgTMatrix", "zsTMatrix", "ztTMatrix",
00410                      ""};
00411     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00412         ctype = Matrix_check_class_etc(x, valid);
00413     SEXP islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00414     int m = LENGTH(islot);
00415     Rboolean do_Udiag = (check_Udiag && ctype % 3 == 2 && (*diag_P(x) == 'U'));
00416     if (ctype < 0) error(_("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_triplet"));
00417 
00418     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_triplet)); /* zero the struct */
00419 
00420     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_LONG;  /* characteristics of the system */
00421     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00422                                 /* nzmax, dimensions, types and slots : */
00423     ans->nnz = ans->nzmax = m;
00424     ans->nrow = dims[0];
00425     ans->ncol = dims[1];
00426     ans->stype = stype(ctype, x);
00427     ans->xtype = xtype(ctype);
00428     ans->i = (void *) INTEGER(islot);
00429     ans->j = (void *) INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym));
00430     ans->x = xpt(ctype, x);
00431 
00432     if(do_Udiag) {
00433         /* diagU2N(.) "in place", similarly to Tsparse_diagU2N [./Tsparse.c]
00434            (but without new SEXP): */
00435         int k = m + dims[0];
00436         CHM_TR tmp = cholmod_l_copy_triplet(ans, &c);
00437         int *a_i, *a_j;
00438 
00439         if(!cholmod_l_reallocate_triplet((size_t) k, tmp, &c))
00440             error(_("as_cholmod_triplet(): could not reallocate for internal diagU2N()"
00441                       ));
00442 
00443         /* TODO? instead of copy_triplet() & reallocate_triplet()
00444          * ---- allocate to correct length + Memcpy() here, as in
00445          * Tsparse_diagU2N() & chTr2Ralloc() below */
00446         a_i = tmp->i;
00447         a_j = tmp->j;
00448         /* add (@i, @j)[k+m] = k, @x[k+m] = 1.   for k = 0,..,(n-1) */
00449         for(k=0; k < dims[0]; k++) {
00450             a_i[k+m] = k;
00451             a_j[k+m] = k;
00452 
00453             switch(ctype / 3) {
00454             case 0: { /* "d" */
00455                 double *a_x = tmp->x;
00456                 a_x[k+m] = 1.;
00457                 break;
00458             }
00459             case 1: { /* "l" */
00460                 int *a_x = tmp->x;
00461                 a_x[k+m] = 1;
00462                 break;
00463             }
00464             case 2: /* "n" */
00465                 break;
00466             case 3: { /* "z" */
00467                 double *a_x = tmp->x;
00468                 a_x[2*(k+m)  ] = 1.;
00469                 a_x[2*(k+m)+1] = 0.;
00470                 break;
00471             }
00472             }
00473         } /* for(k) */
00474 
00475         chTr2Ralloc(ans, tmp);
00476         cholmod_l_free_triplet(&tmp, &c);
00477 
00478     } /* else :
00479        * NOTE: if(*diag_P(x) == 'U'), the diagonal is lost (!);
00480        * ---- that may be ok, e.g. if we are just converting from/to Tsparse,
00481        *      but is *not* at all ok, e.g. when used before matrix products */
00482 
00483     return ans;
00484 }
00485 
00501 SEXP chm_triplet_to_SEXP(CHM_TR a, int dofree, int uploT, int Rkind,
00502                          const char* diag, SEXP dn)
00503 {
00504     SEXP ans;
00505     char *cl = "";              /* -Wall */
00506     int *dims;
00507 
00508     PROTECT(dn);  /* dn is usually UNPROTECTed before the call */
00509                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00510     switch(a->xtype) {
00511     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00512         cl = uploT ? "ntTMatrix" :
00513             ((a->stype) ? "nsTMatrix" : "ngTMatrix");
00514         break;
00515     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00516         switch(Rkind) {
00517         case 0:
00518             cl = uploT ? "dtTMatrix" :
00519                 ((a->stype) ? "dsTMatrix" : "dgTMatrix");
00520             break;
00521         case 1:
00522             cl = uploT ? "ltTMatrix" :
00523                 ((a->stype) ? "lsTMatrix" : "lgTMatrix");
00524             break;
00525         }
00526         break;
00527     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00528         cl = uploT ? "ztTMatrix" :
00529             ((a->stype) ? "zsTMatrix" : "zgTMatrix");
00530         break;
00531     default: error(_("unknown xtype in cholmod_triplet object"));
00532     }
00533     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00534                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00535     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00536     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00537     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, a->nnz)),
00538            (int *) a->i, a->nnz);
00539     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_jSym, INTSXP, a->nnz)),
00540            (int *) a->j, a->nnz);
00541                                 /* copy data slot if present */
00542     if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00543         int i, *m_x;
00544         double *a_x = (double *) a->x;
00545         switch(Rkind) {
00546         case 0:
00547             Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, a->nnz)),
00548                    a_x, a->nnz);
00549             break;
00550         case 1:
00551             m_x= LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, a->nnz));
00552             for (i=0; i < a->nnz; i++)
00553                 m_x[i] = ISNAN(a_x[i]) ? NA_LOGICAL : (int) a_x[i]; /* or f != 0 */
00554             break;
00555         }
00556     }
00557     else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00558         error(_("complex sparse matrix code not yet written"));
00559 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, a->nnz)), */
00560 /*             (complex *) a->x, a->nz); */
00561     if (uploT) {                /* slots for triangularMatrix */
00562         if (a->stype) error(_("Symmetric and triangular both set"));
00563         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym, mkString((uploT > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00564         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_diagSym, mkString(diag));
00565     }
00566                                 /* set symmetry attributes */
00567     if (a->stype)
00568         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,
00569                  mkString((a->stype > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00570     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_l_free_triplet(&a, &c);
00571     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00572     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00573         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00574     UNPROTECT(2);
00575     return ans;
00576 }
00577 
00591 CHM_DN as_cholmod_dense(CHM_DN ans, SEXP x)
00592 {
00593 #define _AS_cholmod_dense_1                                             \
00594     char *valid[] = {"dmatrix", "dgeMatrix",                            \
00595                      "lmatrix", "lgeMatrix",                            \
00596                      "nmatrix", "ngeMatrix",                            \
00597                      "zmatrix", "zgeMatrix", ""};                       \
00598     int dims[2], ctype = Matrix_check_class_etc(x, valid), nprot = 0; \
00599                                                                         \
00600     if (ctype < 0) {            /* not a classed matrix */              \
00601         if (isMatrix(x)) Memcpy(dims, INTEGER(getAttrib(x, R_DimSymbol)), 2); \
00602         else {dims[0] = LENGTH(x); dims[1] = 1;}                        \
00603         if (isInteger(x)) {                                             \
00604             x = PROTECT(coerceVector(x, REALSXP));                      \
00605             nprot++;                                                    \
00606         }                                                               \
00607         ctype = (isReal(x) ? 0 :                                        \
00608                  (isLogical(x) ? 2 : /* logical -> default to "l", not "n" */ \
00609                   (isComplex(x) ? 6 : -1)));                            \
00610     } else Memcpy(dims, INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)), 2);        \
00611     if (ctype < 0) error(_("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_dense")); \
00612     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_dense)); /* zero the struct */        \
00613                                                                         \
00614     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE; /* characteristics of the system */    \
00615     ans->x = ans->z = (void *) NULL;                                    \
00616                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */              \
00617     ans->d = ans->nrow = dims[0];                                       \
00618     ans->ncol = dims[1];                                                \
00619     ans->nzmax = dims[0] * dims[1];                                     \
00620                                 /* set the xtype and any elements */    \
00621     switch(ctype / 2) {                                                 \
00622     case 0: /* "d" */                                                   \
00623         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;                                      \
00624         ans->x = (void *) REAL((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x); \
00625         break
00626 
00627     _AS_cholmod_dense_1;
00628 
00629     case 1: /* "l" */
00630         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00631         ans->x = RallocedREAL((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x);
00632         break;
00633     case 2: /* "n" */
00634         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00635         ans->x = (void *) LOGICAL((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x);
00636         break;
00637 
00638 #define _AS_cholmod_dense_2                                             \
00639     case 3: /* "z" */                                                   \
00640         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_COMPLEX;                                   \
00641         ans->x = (void *) COMPLEX((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x); \
00642         break;                                                          \
00643     }                                                                   \
00644     UNPROTECT(nprot);                                                   \
00645     return ans
00646 
00647     _AS_cholmod_dense_2;
00648 }
00649 
00650 /* version of as_cholmod_dense() that produces a cholmod_dense matrix
00651  * with REAL 'x' slot -- i.e. treats "nMatrix" as "lMatrix" -- as only difference;
00652  * Not just via a flag in as_cholmod_dense() since that has fixed API */
00653 CHM_DN as_cholmod_x_dense(cholmod_dense *ans, SEXP x)
00654 {
00655     _AS_cholmod_dense_1;
00656 
00657     case 1: /* "l" */
00658     case 2: /* "n" (no NA in 'x', but *has* 'x' slot => treat as "l" */
00659         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00660         ans->x = RallocedREAL((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x);
00661         break;
00662 
00663     _AS_cholmod_dense_2;
00664 }
00665 
00666 #undef _AS_cholmod_dense_1
00667 #undef _AS_cholmod_dense_2
00668 
00669 void R_cholmod_error(int status, const char *file, int line, const char *message)
00670 {
00671     CHM_restore_common(); /* restore any setting that may have been changed */
00672 
00673 /* NB: keep in sync with M_R_cholmod_error(), ../inst/include/Matrix_stubs.c */
00674 
00675     /* From CHOLMOD/Include/cholmod_core.h : ...status values.
00676        zero means success, negative means a fatal error, positive is a warning.
00677     */
00678 #ifndef R_CHOLMOD_ALWAYS_ERROR
00679     if(status < 0) {
00680 #endif
00681         error(_("Cholmod error '%s' at file:%s, line %d"), message, file, line);
00682 #ifndef R_CHOLMOD_ALWAYS_ERROR
00683     }
00684     else
00685         warning(_("Cholmod warning '%s' at file:%s, line %d"),
00686                 message, file, line);
00687 #endif
00688 }
00689 
00690 /* just to get 'int' instead of 'void' as required by CHOLMOD's print_function */
00691 static
00692 int R_cholmod_printf(const char* fmt, ...)
00693 {
00694     va_list(ap);
00695 
00696     va_start(ap, fmt);
00697     Rprintf((char *)fmt, ap);
00698     va_end(ap);
00699     return 0;
00700 }
00701 
00710 int R_cholmod_l_start(CHM_CM cl)
00711 {
00712 /* NB: keep in sync with M_R_cholmod_l_start(), ../inst/include/Matrix_stubs.c */
00713     int res;
00714     if (!(res = cholmod_l_start(cl)))
00715         error(_("Unable to initialize cholmod_l: error code %d"), res);
00716     cl->print_function = R_cholmod_printf; /* Rprintf gives warning */
00717     /* Since we provide an error handler, it may not be a good idea to
00718      * allow CHOLMOD printing.
00719      * FIXME? alternative {slightly more efficient}:
00720      * do *compile* CHOLMOD with '#define NPRINT'  */
00721     cl->print_function = NULL;
00722     cl->error_handler = R_cholmod_error;
00723     return TRUE;
00724 }
00725 
00738 /* FIXME: should also have args  (int uploST, char *diag) */
00739 
00740 SEXP chm_dense_to_SEXP(CHM_DN a, int dofree, int Rkind, SEXP dn)
00741 {
00742     SEXP ans;
00743     char *cl = ""; /* -Wall */
00744     int *dims, ntot;
00745 
00746     PROTECT(dn); /* << (why? -- just cut&paste from chm_dense_to_mat.. below*/
00747 
00748     switch(a->xtype) {          /* determine the class of the result */
00749 /* CHOLMOD_PATTERN never happens because cholmod_dense can't :
00750  *     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00751  *      cl = "ngeMatrix"; break;
00752  */
00753     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00754         switch(Rkind) { /* -1: special for this function! */
00755         case -1: cl = "ngeMatrix"; break;
00756         case 0:  cl = "dgeMatrix"; break;
00757         case 1:  cl = "lgeMatrix"; break;
00758         default: error(_("unknown 'Rkind'"));
00759         }
00760         break;
00761     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00762         cl = "zgeMatrix"; break;
00763     default:
00764         error(_("unknown xtype"));
00765     }
00766 
00767     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00768                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00769     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00770     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00771     ntot = dims[0] * dims[1];
00772     if (a->d == a->nrow) {      /* copy data slot -- always present in dense(!) */
00773         if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00774             int i, *m_x;
00775             switch(Rkind) {
00776             case 0:
00777                 Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, ntot)),
00778                        (double *) a->x, ntot);
00779                 break;
00780             case -1: /* nge*/
00781             case 1:  /* lge*/
00782                 m_x = LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, ntot));
00783                 for (i=0; i < ntot; i++)
00784                     m_x[i] = (int) ((double *) a->x)[i];
00785 /*              Memcpy(LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, ntot)), */
00786 /*                     (int *) a->x, ntot); */
00787                 break;
00788             }
00789         }
00790         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00791             error(_("complex sparse matrix code not yet written"));
00792 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, ntot)), */
00793 /*             (complex *) a->x, ntot); */
00794     } else error(_("code for cholmod_dense with holes not yet written"));
00795 
00796     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_l_free_dense(&a, &c);
00797     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00798     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00799         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00800     UNPROTECT(2);
00801     return ans;
00802 }
00803 
00814 SEXP chm_dense_to_matrix(CHM_DN a, int dofree, SEXP dn)
00815 {
00816     SEXP ans;
00817     SEXPTYPE typ;
00818 
00819     PROTECT(dn);
00820                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00821     typ = (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? LGLSXP :
00822         ((a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) ? REALSXP :
00823          ((a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX) ? CPLXSXP : NILSXP));
00824     if (typ == NILSXP) error(_("unknown xtype"));
00825 
00826     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(typ, a->nrow, a->ncol));
00827     if (a->d == a->nrow) {      /* copy data slot if present */
00828         if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL)
00829             Memcpy(REAL(ans), (double *) a->x, a->nrow * a->ncol);
00830         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00831             error(_("complex sparse matrix code not yet written"));
00832         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_PATTERN)
00833             error(_("don't know if a dense pattern matrix makes sense"));
00834 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, a->nnz)), */
00835 /*             (complex *) a->x, a->nz); */
00836     } else error(_("code for cholmod_dense with holes not yet written"));
00837 
00838     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_l_free_dense(&a, &c);
00839     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00840     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00841         setAttrib(ans, R_DimNamesSymbol, duplicate(dn));
00842     UNPROTECT(2);
00843     return ans;
00844 }
00845 
00846 CHM_DN numeric_as_chm_dense(CHM_DN ans, double *v, int nr, int nc)
00847 {
00848     ans->d = ans->nrow = nr;
00849     ans->ncol = nc;
00850     ans->nzmax = nr * nc;
00851     ans->x = (void *) v;
00852     ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00853     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00854     return ans;
00855 }
00856 
00870 CHM_FR as_cholmod_factor(CHM_FR ans, SEXP x)
00871 {
00872     char *valid[] = {"dCHMsuper", "dCHMsimpl", "nCHMsuper", "nCHMsimpl", ""};
00873     int *type = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("type"))),
00874         ctype = Matrix_check_class_etc(x, valid);
00875     SEXP tmp;
00876 
00877     if (ctype < 0) error(_("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_factor"));
00878     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_factor)); /* zero the struct */
00879 
00880     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_LONG;  /* characteristics of the system */
00881     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00882     ans->z = (void *) NULL;
00883     ans->xtype = (ctype < 2) ? CHOLMOD_REAL : CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00884 
00885     ans->ordering = type[0];    /* unravel the type */
00886     ans->is_ll = (type[1] ? 1 : 0);
00887     ans->is_super = (type[2] ? 1 : 0);
00888     ans->is_monotonic = (type[3] ? 1 : 0);
00889                                 /* check for consistency */
00890     if ((!(ans->is_ll)) && ans->is_super)
00891         error(_("Supernodal LDL' decomposition not available"));
00892     if ((!type[2]) ^ (ctype % 2))
00893         error(_("Supernodal/simplicial class inconsistent with type flags"));
00894                                 /* slots always present */
00895     tmp = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_permSym);
00896     ans->minor = ans->n = LENGTH(tmp); ans->Perm = INTEGER(tmp);
00897     ans->ColCount = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("colcount")));
00898     ans->z = ans->x = (void *) NULL;
00899     if (ctype < 2) {
00900         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym);
00901         ans->x = REAL(tmp);
00902     }
00903     if (ans->is_super) {        /* supernodal factorization */
00904         ans->xsize = LENGTH(tmp);
00905         ans->maxcsize = type[4]; ans->maxesize = type[5];
00906         ans->i = (int*)NULL;
00907         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("super"));
00908         ans->nsuper = LENGTH(tmp) - 1; ans->super = INTEGER(tmp);
00909         /* Move these checks to the CHMfactor_validate function */
00910         if (ans->nsuper < 1)
00911             error(_("Number of supernodes must be positive when is_super is TRUE"));
00912         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("pi"));
00913         if (LENGTH(tmp) != ans->nsuper + 1)
00914             error(_("Lengths of super and pi must be equal"));
00915         ans->pi = INTEGER(tmp);
00916         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("px"));
00917         if (LENGTH(tmp) != ans->nsuper + 1)
00918             error(_("Lengths of super and px must be equal"));
00919         ans->px = INTEGER(tmp);
00920         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("s"));
00921         ans->ssize = LENGTH(tmp); ans->s = INTEGER(tmp);
00922     } else {
00923         ans->nzmax = LENGTH(tmp);
00924         ans->p = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym));
00925         ans->i = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym));
00926         ans->nz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("nz")));
00927         ans->next = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("nxt")));
00928         ans->prev = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("prv")));
00929     }
00930     if (!cholmod_l_check_factor(ans, &c))
00931         error(_("failure in as_cholmod_factor"));
00932     return ans;
00933 }
00934 
00944 SEXP chm_factor_to_SEXP(CHM_FR f, int dofree)
00945 {
00946     SEXP ans;
00947     int *dims, *type;
00948     char *class = (char*) NULL; /* -Wall */
00949 
00950     switch(f->xtype) {
00951     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00952         class = f->is_super ? "dCHMsuper" : "dCHMsimpl";
00953         break;
00954     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00955         class = f->is_super ? "nCHMsuper" : "nCHMsimpl";
00956         break;
00957     default:
00958         error(_("f->xtype of %d not recognized"), f->xtype);
00959     }
00960     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(class)));
00961     if (f->minor < f->n)
00962         error(_("CHOLMOD factorization was unsuccessful"));
00963     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00964     dims[0] = dims[1] = f->n;
00965                                 /* copy component of known length */
00966     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_permSym, INTSXP, f->n)),
00967            (int*)f->Perm, f->n);
00968     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("colcount"), INTSXP, f->n)),
00969            (int*)f->ColCount, f->n);
00970     type = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("type"), INTSXP, f->is_super ? 6 : 4));
00971     type[0] = f->ordering; type[1] = f->is_ll;
00972     type[2] = f->is_super; type[3] = f->is_monotonic;
00973     if (f->is_super) {
00974         type[4] = f->maxcsize; type[5] = f->maxesize;
00975         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("super"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00976                (int*)f->super, f->nsuper+1);
00977         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("pi"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00978                (int*)f->pi, f->nsuper + 1);
00979         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("px"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00980                (int*)f->px, f->nsuper + 1);
00981         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("s"), INTSXP, f->ssize)),
00982                (int*)f->s, f->ssize);
00983         Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, f->xsize)),
00984                (double*)f->x, f->xsize);
00985     } else {
00986         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, f->nzmax)),
00987                (int*)f->i, f->nzmax);
00988         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, f->n + 1)),
00989                (int*)f->p, f->n + 1);
00990         Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, f->nzmax)),
00991                (double*)f->x, f->nzmax);
00992         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("nz"), INTSXP, f->n)),
00993                (int*)f->nz, f->n);
00994         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("nxt"), INTSXP, f->n + 2)),
00995                (int*)f->next, f->n + 2);
00996         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("prv"), INTSXP, f->n + 2)),
00997                (int*)f->prev, f->n + 2);
00998 
00999     }
01000     if(dofree) {
01001         if (dofree > 0) cholmod_l_free_factor(&f, &c);
01002         else /* dofree < 0 */ Free(f);
01003     }
01004     UNPROTECT(1);
01005     return ans;
01006 }
01007 
01019 void chm_diagN2U(CHM_SP chx, int uploT, Rboolean do_realloc)
01020 {
01021     int i, n = chx->nrow, nnz = (int)cholmod_l_nnz(chx, &c),
01022         n_nnz = nnz - n, /* the new nnz : we will have removed  n entries */
01023         i_to = 0, i_from = 0;
01024 
01025     if(chx->ncol != n)
01026         error(_("chm_diagN2U(<non-square matrix>): nrow=%d, ncol=%d"),
01027               n, chx->ncol);
01028 
01029     if (!chx->sorted || !chx->packed) cholmod_l_sort(chx, &c);
01030                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */
01031 
01032 #define _i(I) (   (int*) chx->i)[I]
01033 #define _x(I) ((double*) chx->x)[I]
01034 #define _p(I) (   (int*) chx->p)[I]
01035 
01036     /* work by copying from i_from to i_to ==> MUST i_to <= i_from */
01037 
01038     if(uploT == 1) { /* "U" : upper triangular */
01039 
01040         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* looking at i-th column */
01041             int j, n_i = _p(i+1) - _p(i); /* = #{entries} in this column */
01042 
01043             /* 1) copy all but the last _above-diagonal_ column-entries: */
01044             for(j = 1; j < n_i; j++, i_to++, i_from++) {
01045                 _i(i_to) = _i(i_from);
01046                 _x(i_to) = _x(i_from);
01047             }
01048 
01049             /* 2) drop the last column-entry == diagonal entry */
01050             i_from++;
01051         }
01052     }
01053     else if(uploT == -1) { /* "L" : lower triangular */
01054 
01055         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* looking at i-th column */
01056             int j, n_i = _p(i+1) - _p(i); /* = #{entries} in this column */
01057 
01058             /* 1) drop the first column-entry == diagonal entry */
01059             i_from++;
01060 
01061             /* 2) copy the other _below-diagonal_ column-entries: */
01062             for(j = 1; j < n_i; j++, i_to++, i_from++) {
01063                 _i(i_to) = _i(i_from);
01064                 _x(i_to) = _x(i_from);
01065             }
01066         }
01067     }
01068     else {
01069         error(_("chm_diagN2U(x, uploT = %d): uploT should be +- 1"), uploT);
01070     }
01071 
01072     /* the column pointers are modified the same in both cases :*/
01073     for(i=1; i <= n; i++)
01074         _p(i) -= i;
01075 
01076 #undef _i
01077 #undef _x
01078 #undef _p
01079 
01080     if(do_realloc) /* shorten (i- and x-slots from nnz to n_nnz */
01081         cholmod_l_reallocate_sparse(n_nnz, chx, &c);
01082     return;
01083 }
